title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item in library outline view on first attempt
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item does not get selected. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the view for the first time.

OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the intended item.

EB: The second time I attempt to select the label item, it gets selected as expected.

SR: 
1. Open the application and navigate to the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view for the first time.
3. Observe that the item does not get selected, and the focus jumps to the library file node.
4. Repeat step 2 and notice that on the second attempt, the item gets selected correctly.
